channel.title: Aqrabuamelu on The Thousand Kingdoms
channel.description: Recent content in Aqrabuamelu on The Thousand Kingdoms

item.title: Adrahasis
item.description: Adrahasis is the unofficial leader of the cohort and is considered a bit of a philosopher warrior of the group. He has a strong grasp of strategy but is not the strongest at tactics and on the ground decisions.

item.title: Davcina
item.description: Davcina is tall and handsome with stern features. Her eyes were a storm at sea blue-grey, and she had high sharp cheekbones. She is very angular looking and has a severe face but is actually very sweet and compassionate. Likes hugs type of person.

item.title: Etana
item.description: Etana is long and lean with dark long hair in long braids with beads woven into the ends of them. He is very attractive but has a raspy voice from a training incident where he got punched in the throat. Personality is shy and withdrawn generally.

item.title: Tauthe
item.description: Tauthe is a bit shorter and rounder than the other Aqrabuamelu. She is the opposite of Davcina in that she has a round open face but is a bit caustic.
